page.title: 12 Farming
page.content: Mr Gatehouse is a local farmer and this is the information we found.He has got 4 tractors, the h/p ranges from{5200}to{7800.}He starts work at 7 o, clock and finishes at around 7 in the evening. He has got {65 }acres for hay and silage.He has{55}cows for milking and he gets{900}litres a day. His favourite animal is the sheep.It takes a week to cut the grass turn and bail it, he has lived on the farm all his life.He gets a dozen eggs a day.He gets {200}bails on one trailor. The tractor he uses most is the Ford{ 6600.After shearing the sheep he takes the wool to Wall Growers Lyons Hall. He has got a sheep dog.Three other people help him.He only rents silage machinery.The busiest time of the year is summer because of bailing silaging and milking.
